## Matrix.PerspectiveFovRHToRef() method

Stores a right-handed perspective projection into a given matrix

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static PerspectiveFovRHToRef(fov: number, aspect: number, znear: number, zfar: number, result: Matrix, isVerticalFovFixed?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fov | <code>number</code> | defines the horizontal field of view |
|  aspect | <code>number</code> | defines the aspect ratio |
|  znear | <code>number</code> | defines the near clip plane |
|  zfar | <code>number</code> | defines the far clip plane |
|  result | <code>Matrix</code> | defines the target matrix |
|  isVerticalFovFixed | <code>boolean</code> | defines it the fov is vertically fixed (default) or horizontally |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
